resources.string: Automatically accepts captive portal terms by clicking accept buttons.
Please enable accessibility service in settings

This app uses Android's Accessibility Service to automatically click "Accept" or "Connect" buttons on captive portal pages.

Why is this needed?
• Captive portals require user interaction to accept terms
• The accessibility service allows the app to automate this safely
• The service only interacts with captive portal pages, not other apps

How to enable:
1. Tap "Open Settings" below
2. Find "WiFi Captive Auto-Login" in the list
3. Toggle it ON
4. Return to this app
Enable the accessibility service to automatically accept captive portal terms.
